game.title: The Missing Heirloom
game.objective: Find the missing family heirloom, a precious diamond necklace.
game.description: The grandmother of the noble family has lost her beloved diamond necklace. It's up to you to find it before the grand ball tonight.
game.reward: A magical amulet granting +10 charm points

task.objective: Spy on the suspicious maid, Agatha.
task.description: You need to follow Agatha and see if she's involved in the theft of the necklace.
task.location: The castle east wing, near the kitchen.

task.objective: Search the garden for any clues.
task.description: The thief might have hidden in plain sight. Look for any unusual objects or footprints.
task.location: The castle garden, near the fountain.
